original_title: Garage, des moteurs et des hommes
overview: A small picturesque Proven√ßal village. Certainly, I grew up there, but today life seems to have somewhat deserted it.  Except for the car and motorcycle repair garage where everyone, I mean the men, come to have their car serviced. What do they do ? What do they talk about ? A breakdown develops into a nail-biting suspense, the garage becomes the place of masculine transmission. Men are amongst themselves and repair metal bodies.
title: Garage, Engines, and Men
